javadoc:
Panel that shows information about the selected extension in the {@link ExtensionTablePanel}. This is essentially a view into the {@link ExtensionDetails} for the extension.

Note: The text is rendered as html to allow proper formatting (colors/font weight).

methods.javadoc:
Updates this panel with the given extension.
@param details the extension to display
methods.name: setDescription
methods.comment: Updates this panel with the given extension.

name: ExtensionDetailsPanel
comment:
Panel that shows information about the selected extension in the ExtensionTablePanel. This
 is essentially a view into the ExtensionDetails for the extension.
 
 Note: The text is rendered as html to allow proper formatting (colors/font weight).
